mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.id AS sm_id,sm.remark AS sm_remark, sm.del_flag as sm_del_flag, sm.parent_id AS sm_parent_id,sm.name AS sm_name,sm.type AS sm_type, sm.href AS sm_href,sm.target AS sm_target,sm.icon AS sm_icon,sm.show_flag AS sm_show_flag, sm.permission AS sm_permission,sm.path AS sm_path,sm.sort AS sm_sort FROM sys_role_sys_menu AS srsm LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON srsm.sys_menu_id=sm.id WHERE srsm.sys_role_id IN( SELECT DISTINCT susr.sys_role_id FROM sys_user_sys_role AS susr LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=susr.sys_role_id WHERE susr.sys_user_id=#{userId} AND sr.del_flag='Y' AND sr.useable='Y' ) AND sm.del_flag='Y' AND sm.show_flag='Y'
